page.title: 20IDEAS BY THE AUTHORS
page.content: When asked how they thought that North Kyme could be improved they made the following decisions. 1.The churchyard should be kept tidier. 2.There should be a pulic dustbin. 3. There should be a zebra crossing near the school. 4.There should be a playground with swings and slides, a football pitch, and a cycle track. 5.There should be more than one bus a day. {THE AUTHORS Darren Benton Adam Bailey Richard Jones Andrew Barber Verity Briggs Lee Coombs Jason Tonge Rodney Hamblin Matthew Miller Debbie Hamblin Andrew Scott Vicki Benton Simon Panton Katie Dring Lucy Dring Daniel Harrod
